p:
In one controlled open-label study ( n = 24), patients were given either baricitinib 4 mg/day plus lopinavir–ritonavir or antiretroviral plus hydroxychloroquine (control group) for 2 weeks. Significant improvement of symptoms and laboratory results, no intensive care unit transfer ( versus 33% transfer in control cases), and 58% discharge from wards ( versus 8% in control) was shown among the baricitinib-treated individuals.
14
